snippet: LEEDS--Dalia. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Dalia Leeds, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Dalia's beloved husband, Larry; her daughters, Ashley and Tracy; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEEDS--Dalia. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Dalia Leeds, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Dalia's beloved husband, Larry; her daughters, Ashley and Tracy; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
